nodes.text: Rawarok was a Wookiee that lived during the Galactic Civil War. They were once a slave to a band of Trandoshans from the Zssik Clan, but escaped in 1 ABY with help from a spacer.

Rawarok appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
